title: I Just Want to See You
overview: "Friends since elemantary, now 3rd-year high school students, for a long time Asakura has kept feelings for his childhood friend, Nagase. Given that it is their last summer, he confesses his feelings and suddenly pecks him". This special series is a spin-off of the movie 'BL Metamorphosis', being a live action of the yaoi manga that both leads of the movie are obsessed with.
